articles.title: Sikh boy dies in Canada after he loses control of his vehicle due to bad weather
articles.description: A 17 year-old Indo-Canadian student died after he lost control of his vehicle due to bad weather conditions and crashed into a utility pole, media reports said.
articles.content:
Toronto, January 16
A 17 year-old Indo-Canadian student died after he lost control of his vehicle due to bad weather conditions and crashed into a utility pole, media reports said.

articles.title: The forgotten true story behind Memorial Day—and why it matters now more than ever
articles.description: The story, once lost to history, serves as another reminder of the need for accountability, justice, and equity for people of color as the first steps in true racial reckoning.
